APP_ID.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org/apps Please don't steal!

API_HASH.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org/apps Please don't steal!

BOT_TOKEN.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Create a bot at https://t.me/BotFather and get the token of your bot. Worth it. Get it.

STRING_SESSION.description: Go to https://repl.it/@DogeUserBot/DogeString or paste the # TODO code into a program like termux, terminal, run it and paste the code you get here.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Required for updating the bot and other stuff get it from https://dashboard.heroku.com/account Please don't steal!

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Add the Heroku app name you specified above here. It helps to keep Doge up to date.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable Heroku.

CMDSET.description: (Optional) Set this one with only one the symbol to use it before your command to run like . , ! ' ` /

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: Required for installation and updates. Recommend, don't change it.

ALIVE_NAME.description: (Optional) If you don't give name i'll auto detect your name.

TZ.description: Required for correct time on autopic/get time. Write your time zone location closest to your current location in English. Know your timezone from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc
